Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. ). Marty Mornhinweg was asked if he believed there yet existed a book on Michael Vick , an accepted way to attempt to defend against his variety of skills. "I don't," he said. Because with really good quarterbacks, each[ defensive] team has a combination of things: your personnel, their personnel, schematically what you're built for, where your best pass rush is, where your best corner is, what type of coverages you play best... "All of those things come into play. But one thing I will say is, when you have a quarterback like Mike, people tend to play you differently every week.
